title: Poetry Collection
content:
I thought I’d share this booklet of my poetry I put together. It’s set in Trade Gothic.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20131017150912im_/http:/typophile.com/files/photo_6667.jpg)
author: Ed_Aranda

comments.content: You should check out "poetry concrete" if you have not already. You could also look up "concrete poetry."
